entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Forillon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
